title: Best of All Worlds: Confluent Synthesizes Streaming and Batch Processing
author: Jelani Harper
description: Snapshot queries blend Kafka topic data with Iceberg or Delta tables; the vendor also announced security and private networking features.
cntitle: 两全其美：Confluent 整合流处理和批处理
cndescription: 快照查询将 Kafka 主题数据与 Iceberg 或 Delta 表格融合；该供应商还宣布了安全和专用网络功能。
